/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling city street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high vantage point, providing a bird's eye view of the urban landscape. The street below is a hive of activity with cars and buses navigating their way through the city's arteries. The buildings that line the street are tall and modern, their facades painted in shades of white and gray, punctuated by occasional splashes of red and green. The sky above is a clear blue, offering a stark contrast to the concrete jungle below.
